titleStmt.title: A translate of a letter from Don Lewis de Harro chief counsellor and Minister of State to his Majesty of Spaine sent unto the King of Scots at Brussels concerning the affaires in England, publication of the Articles of Peace and marriage with France, &c.
titleStmt.author: Méndez de Haro, Luis, 1598-1661.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
